name: Empty Desert (Lyon Tract Approaches)
description: A vast, empty expanse of sun-baked desert, where the only 'entrance' is the harsh, indifferent landscape itself. The ground is cracked and dry, stretching endlessly under an unforgiving sky, a monument to desolation. A few scattered, hardy cacti stand as silent sentinels to the relentless heat. To the south, Lyon's Trail stretches out, a faint, rutted path leading back towards what passes for civilization. To the north, more empty scrubland beckons, promising nothing but quiet, comfortable emptiness.
